entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:54 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 06:54 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:54 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
